cards.name: Guilt
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the end of your turn, take damage equal to the number of cards in your hand.
When drawn, if has another Guilt in your hand, Exhaust all Guilt in your hand and put a Regret in your hand.

relics.name: Golden Razor
relics.description:
Right-click to use in a combat.
Lose 20 gold, gain 1 Strength.

relics.name: Keeper's Sack
relics.description:
Whenever you spend gold in the shop, at the start of each combat, gain 1 Strength or 1 Dexterity or 1 Focus.
You can gain up to 6 Strength, 5 Dexterity and 4 Focus from this relic.

relics.name: Metronome
relics.description:
1 charge, when fully charged, right-click to obtain a random relic for the current room.
Using this relic multiple times in the same room will replace the previous relic with a new one.

relics.name: Mucormycosis
relics.description: Whenever you play an Attack , 25% chance to apply 1 Fungal Spores or Spore Cloud to an enemy.
relics.flavorText: Mucormycosis is a fungal infection triggered by the fungus Trichoderma.The fungi that usually cause the disease are mostly Mucor spp., Rhizopus spp., furrows, or picornithiasis spp.

relics.name: Plum Flute
relics.description:
4 charges, when fully charged, right-click to summons Baby Plum to fight for you in the current room.
Will leave after 3 intents.

relics.name: The Relic
relics.description: Every 5 combats, gain 10 Soul Heart.

relics.name: Blood Puppy
relics.description: At the start of each combat, spawn a Blood Puppy pet.

relics.name: Glass Cannon
relics.description:
1 charge, when fully charged, right-click to deal 30 damage to ALL enemies.
After use, triple your next unblocked damage.
Whenever you received an unblocked damage after use, this relic will be broken.
Repairing this relic requires 4 charges.

relics.name: Hemoptysis
relics.description:
The first time you play ttack in each combat, apply 3 Vulnerable to the enemy.
Whenever an enemy dies with Vulnerable, deal the damage equals to the last damage it was taken to ALL enemies and apply 2 Vulnerable to them.

relics.name: Larynx
relics.description:
12 charges, right-click to use even not fully charged.
Deals 3 times the number of charged levels of damage to ALL enemies.
Increase the charge by 1 when takes an unblocked damage.

relics.name: Sulfur
relics.description: 3 charges, when fully charged, right-click to add a Bloody Brimstone in your hand.

relics.name: Suplex!
relics.description: 3 charges, when fully charged, right-click to deal 50 damage to an enemy.

relics.name: Book Of Virtues
relics.description:
4 charges, when fully charged, right click to summon a wisp.
When you have any other chargeable relic, this relic cannot be used by right clicking directly.
When you right click to use any other chargeable relics, summon a wisp with corresponding special effects.

relics.name: Echo Chamber
relics.description: The first card you play in each turn will trigger the effect of the first card you play in recent 3 turns of the combat once.
relics.flavorText: I can see see the future future future...

relics.name: Holy Mantle
relics.description: Prevent the first time you would lose HP each combat.

relics.name: Lazarus' Rags
relics.description:
There's 1 resurrection chance on each act.
After resurrection through this relic, lose 10 max health(if your max health is less than 10, set it to 10 ), heal 10, gain 1 Strength at the start of each combat and multiply your attack damage by 1.6 at the current act.
If you resurrect in combat through this relic, it will be deemed that you have not received any damage before resurrection.

relics.name: Red Key
relics.description: 4 charges, when fully charged, right-click to create a new room connected with the current room.

relics.name: Rock Bottom
relics.description:
You can no longer gain negative effects.
The amount of Strength , Dexterity and Focus will not be able to decrease and can't be remove.

relics.name: TMTRAINER
relics.description: Z1s/zEI/Z ZX? Zz=Z%zZ

relics.name: The Body
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 21.

relics.name: Blood Oath
relics.description:
At the start of the first combat on each act, Drain your health to 1.
At the start of each combat at the current act, for each 10 HP drained, gain 2 Strength, Block and 1 Dexterity (Round up).

relics.name: Crown Of Light
relics.description:
Upon pickup, gain 20 Soul Heart.
If your HP is full and didn't take any unblocked damage, gain Double Damage at the start of your turn.

relics.name: Holy Grail
relics.description:
Upon pickup, raise you Max HP by 7.
At the start of each combat, gain 1 Flight.

relics.name: Jupiter
relics.description:
At the start of each combat, lose 2 Dexterity.
Whenever you play a Skill, the counter increases by 1 and gain 1 Dexterity.
Whenever you play an Attack, if the counter is not equal to zero, decrease the counter by 1 and lose 1 Dexterity, apply 3 Poison to the enemy who takes the unblocked Attack damage.

relics.name: Luna
relics.description:
Starting from the next act, the probability of an ? room doubling.
Whenever you passed a ? room, gain 5 Soul Heart and at the start of the next combat, gain 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: The moon's blessing shines upon you.

relics.name: Mars
relics.description:
3 charges, when fully charged, right-click to dash, deal 32 damage to ALL enemies.
You are Invincible during the dash.

relics.name: Mercurius
relics.description:
At the start of each combat, gain 3 Dexterity.
You can leave the room at any time during the combat.

relics.name: Neptunus
relics.description: If you do not play any Attacks during your turn, gain Double Damage next turn.

relics.name: Revelation
relics.description:
Upon pickup, gain 20 Soul Hearts.
At the start of each combat, gain 1 Flight.
Right click to use all [E] , deals damage to ALL enemies equal to the amount of [E] spent 15 times.

relics.name: Sacred Heart
relics.description:
Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 7 and heal all of your HP.
At the start of each combat, gain 1 Strength.
Your attack deals 2.3x damage.

relics.name: Sol
relics.description: Every time you victory in a boss combat: Heal all HP(Ignore Mark of the Bloom), remove all Curses in your deck, at the start of each combat, gain 2 Strength.

relics.name: Terra
relics.description:
At the start of each combat, gain 1 Strength.
Your base Attack damage is halved.
Whenever you play two attack cards, the base damage of the next attack card is quadrupled.

relics.name: The Stairway
relics.description: The shop has a 50% chance of selling the relics from the Angel Room.
relics.flavorText: May you get what you came for.

relics.name: The Wafer
relics.description: Whenever you would receive 8 or more unblocked damage, reduce it to 7.

relics.name: Venus
relics.description:
Upon pickup, raise you Max HP by 7.
At the start of each combat, apply 3 Weak to ALL enemies.
Whenever you take an unblocked Attack damage, the attacker lose 3 Strength.

relics.name: Glitched Crown
relics.description: Relics dropped from the combat reward screen; Relics sold in the shop; And relics in the boss relic select screen will be cycled among 5 random relics.

relics.name: R Key
relics.description:
One time use relic, right click to use.
Teleport to Exordium.

relics.name: Spirit Link
relics.description: Whenever you play a Power card, remove it from your master deck, then trigger the effect of these Power cards at the start of each combat(the Power cards added during the combat are not included, the card with the same name only retains the one with the most Upgrade times).

relics.name: 4.5 Volt
relics.description:
Cleaning the room will no longer charge the chargeable relics.
For every 70 damage done, charge the first chargeable relic in the relic list.
A single attack can only increase charge by one at most.
relics.flavorText: Beat the juice out of them!

relics.name: Alabaster Box
relics.description:
Alabaster Box has to be charged by picking up Soul Hearts or Black Hearts.
It requires 30 charges, when fully charged, right click to obtain 2 Angel Room relics and 15 Soul Hearts (If a Devil Deal was taken previously, gain 10 Soul Hearts and one Angel Room relic instead).

relics.name: Battery Pack
relics.description: Upon pickup, fully charged ALL chargeable relic and add 3 Battery to your deck.

relics.name: Birthright
relics.description: It has different effects on each character.

relics.name: Eraser
relics.description:
Each act can be used once against an enemy.
If the target is a non-boss enemy, kill it instantly; If it's a boss enemy, deal 15 damage.
The enemies killed by Eraser will not appear in this game.

relics.name: Red Stew
relics.description:
Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 7 and heal 15.
The initial counter of this relic is 22.
Once you enter a room, the counter decreases by 2 ; At the end of your turn, the counter decreases by 2 and lose 2 Strength.
At the start of each combat, gain Strength equal to the counter.
When Fatal, the counter increases by 1 and gain 1 Strength.
When the counter returns to zero, the relic is used up.
relics.flavorText: Esau despised his birthright. He gave up the birthright in exchange for the red stew.

keywords.name: Fungal Spores
keywords.description: Upon apply, apply 4 Poison to ALL enemies. After 2 turns, deal 5 damage to owner and transfer this effect to up to 2 random enemies.

keywords.name: Spore Cloud
keywords.description: When this enemy dies, give you the effect amount of Vulnerable .

mods.name: IsaacMod Extend
mods.description: 加入了忏悔新增的道具，需要同以撒mod一起使用。
